name: avalynx-autocomplete
title: AvalynxAutocomplete
description: AvalynxAutocomplete is a lightweight, customizable autocomplete component for web applications. It is designed to be used with Bootstrap version 5.3 or higher and does not require any framework dependencies.

author.name: Juergen Schwind an the AvalynxAutocomplete Authors

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist; shx mkdir -p dist/js/; shx cp src/js/avalynx-autocomplete.js dist/js/avalynx-autocomplete.js; shx cp src/js/avalynx-autocomplete.js dist/js/avalynx-autocomplete.esm.js; node build.js dist/js/avalynx-autocomplete.esm.js; shx mkdir -p dist/css/; shx cp src/css/avalynx-autocomplete.css dist/css/avalynx-autocomplete.css
